content: this knitting pattern offered free of charge by biscotte yarns is a new version of our very popular non-felted slippers pattern 1 now available in the following sizes 6-12 month 1-2 years old 3-4 years old 5-8 years old 9-12 years old woman small medium large x large and men small medium large x large new this version is worked from the ankle to the sole **2016-10-26** a reference to a tutorial showing the increase technique used in this pattern has been added to the pdf click here for a direct link to the increase tutorial 2 **2016-10-31** errata sole round 2 k1 **ssk no yarn over ** k until there are 3 sts la version française est disponible sur notre site francophone leslainesbiscotte com 3 1 https //biscotteyarns com/products/non-felted-slippers-pattern-biscottes-version 2 https //biscotteyarns com/blogs/knitting/left-and-right-simple-inset-increase 3 https //leslainesbiscotte com/products/patron-de-pantoufles-les-nouvelles-pantoufles-de-biscotte
